DOC.brief_title: IOTA Versus Pattern Recognition Method Diagnosis Ovarian Masses
DOC.criteria: Ovarian mass 5 cm size ( confirm transvaginal transabdominal ultrasonography gynecology clinic ) The patient candidate abdominal exploration ovarian Cystectomy oophorectomy . Complicated ovarian mass . Unfit surgery .
